data.name: Bring Back The Sun by Daniel da Silva
data.detailed_description:
Check out my next game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1535240/Sonucido_The_Mage_by_Daniel_da_Silva/


About the Game

Bring Back The Sun


Bring Back The Sun is a simple but challenging 2D Platformer.
The focus is on jumping right and only that. No enemies, no spikes, no wall jumps, no double jumps. Just simple jumps to get through the levels.

Features


  • A pure experience
  • Challenging but not hardcore
  • Jump through over 40 levels
  • Minimalistic graphics
  • Full Controller Support
  • Atmospheric soundtrack

You can expect 1-3 hours playtime for your first run depending on your skill level.

data.short_description: Bring Back The Sun is a short and challenging 2D Platformer. The goal is obvious - bring back the sun! No enemies, no spikes, just jumping above the bottomless pit.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Celeron G3900 / Athlon 200GE
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 510 / Vega 3 / GT 710
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-6100 / Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 / RX 550 / GT 1030
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Should work on most Distros that are more or less updated
  • Processor: Celeron G3900 / Athlon 200GE
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 510 / Vega 3 / GT 710
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: I used MX Linux 19.3 for developing the game
  • Processor: i3-6100 / Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 / RX 550 / GT 1030
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
